title: Finding the Residual: Boys vs. Girls
question_text: The least squares regression line for the number of boys and girls in a classroom is given as: ˆ b = − 5.2 + 2.1 g ...where b stands for boys and g stands for  girls. Mrs. Brancard's class has 11 girls and 15 boys. Which of the following is the residual for the number of boys in her classroom?
